conversations.body_text: Hi Jonas Roth,     Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping. We will update you with the tracking number tomorrow.
